abstract: HD Supply Holdings, an industrial distribution company owned by a group of private equity firms, has filed to go public. It plans to use the proceeds to pay down debt.
snippet: HD Supply Holdings, an industrial distribution company owned by a group of private equity firms, has filed to go public. It plans to use the proceeds to pay down debt.
lead_paragraph: HD Supply Holdings, an industrial distribution company owned by a group of private equity firms, filed on Friday to go public.

headline.main: HD Supply, Backed by Carlyle and Bain, Files for I.P.O.
